price: ‘তেনেহ’লে, হে মোৰ প্ৰতিপালক! তুমি মোক যালিম সম্প্ৰদায়ৰ অন্তৰ্ভুক্ত নকৰিবা’।
arabic: رَبِّ فَلَا تَجۡعَلۡنِي فِي ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbi falā tajʿalnī fī al-qawmi al-ẓālimīna
